thread.title: Multiple fire crews battling 3-alarm blaze in Balch Springs
thread.title_full: Multiple fire crews battling 3-alarm blaze in Balch Springs

author: Marc Ramirez
title: Multiple fire crews battling 3-alarm blaze in Balch Springs
text:
Multiple fire crews battling 3-alarm blaze in Balch Springs Filed under Fire   Get Unlimited Digital Access Your first month is less than a dollar. $0.99 for first 4 weeks Subscribe Now 
Multiple fire units have reportedly responded to a three-alarm fire in Balch Springs whose flames are visible for miles around. 
WFAA-TV (ABC8) reported in a Twitter post that crews from Balch Springs, Dallas, Mesquite, Combine and other departments are battling the blaze, though its actual location is unclear. KXAS-TV (NBC5) reported it as occurring at adjoining Jimmy's Auto Shop, while a WFAA news producer placed it at adjoining Texas Pallet Company. Crazy fire in Balch Springs pic.twitter.com/cplDCjNFpC — Juanye Westđ (@JuanLaker_24) February 25, 2017 
Both businesses are in the 2800 block of South Beltline Road in Balch Springs. 
Twitter users posted video footage of the blaze showing flames freely billowing from the site. Balch springs fire pic.twitter.com/GIJmmUEU1p â Stephen H (@HibbardStephen) February 25, 2017 View Comments
